text:
When i generate a pdf the "<" and ">" sign are not interpreted, instead of
having > in the PDF file generated i have > same problem with < sign.

Is this a bug of FOP or ??

Thanks
creator: david__lux@hotmail.com

text:
This is not a bug! Its a problem in your XSLT stylesheet. Specifically you 
need to wrap text containing special XML characters in <xsl:text disable-
output-escaping="true"></xsl:text>

Please dont raised bug to ask questions. Questions relating to FOP and XSL-FO 
can be raised on the fop-users mailing list. Questions relating to XSLT are 
better asked on the mulberry list.
creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com

text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
